About the Company: Thambbi Modern Spg. Mills Ltd is engaged in textile and other industries in and around Salem.Thambbi Brand Melange is the top dope dyed yarn spun with advanced technology of yarn - dyeing and spinning.The product range of the company includes Ring Spun,Blended Yarn,Fancy Yarn,Processed Yarns and Rotor Spun Yarn (Open End)..The company also in the business segment of Trading Yarn, Rental Service.
